lead_paragraph: A two-division league system for test cricket could be established in three years in a bid to improve standards in the longest form of the game, International Cricket Council chief executive Dave Richardson said on Wednesday.

headline.print_headline: Test League System Possible by 2019, Says ICC Chief
headline.main: Test League System Possible by 2019, Says ICC Chief

snippet: A two-division league system for test cricket could be established in three years in a bid to improve standards in the longest form of the game, International Cricket Council chief executive Dave Richardson said on Wednesday....
